I can imagine! When the pandemic started, it was really hard for me to find a job too. I was looking for almost a year. I can tell you that your motivation will come back once you find a job, but right now, you don't have to be in a rush.

I would suggest trying to work part time or even take some online classes in the meantime to help pay the bills. It's definitely easier to work online than it is to find work in the store.
